rules_text:
Whenever Masborg, Lethal Protector attacks, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, [b][you draw a card and gain 3 life.]
[/b]Flash paradigm {W}{U} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
